column5: Buddy in North Dakota out for a flight yesterday as he'd heard rumours of Elk travelling with the Moose... and he got proof. Not something you'll see every day. Now if they breed...whadda you get?
Hey there are already ligers ( lion and tiger) mix .

stuff like that makes you wonder what the story is behind it. why did this unusual partnership come to be? I doubt the cow would let him breed her, the elk would not appear as a fit mate for an adult cow, im hypothesizing   go into the outdoors enough and you surely see some interesting things
Not sure what you would get. All I can say is Amen to that!!  Enjoy!! Kawartha Kev
I just had to look this one up. Apparently, there is such a thing as a "Tigon" as well.  who knew.
It's only like my favorite animal.
I like the sounds of Melk better...interesting photo indeed!
Man i would like to have one of those in a big,fat,huge....BURGER ON THE BBQ !!!!!!!!....yummy..LOL..LOL..LOL
So...would a Male elkoose be a Buck or bull? And would the Femal be offended if we called her a cow?
Well I don' t know if the elk ever caught up to them cows... but I do know of a Bull... that caught up to a Bison ! Did a lot of damage and left his blood behind as well !
Yah gotta stay off them wimmins in the national art museum !
I can't think of even one thing I can say that will make it pass the filters
100% Moose meat in the Buffalo wings?
This thread has gone terribly wrong
